alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Livingston; Oakland; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall developing in a band of showers and thunderstorms this evening... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and thunderstorms from near Whitmore Lake to Morenci. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall and localized flooding. Wind gusts of 30 mph also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall could lead to localized flooding and ponding of water on area roads. The showers and storms will be near... Hamburg and Whitmore Lake around 630 PM EDT. South Lyon around 645 PM EDT. Brighton around 650 PM EDT. Clayton around 710 PM EDT. Milford around 720 PM EDT. Adrian around 730 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, Hudson Mills Metropark, Ridgeway, Delhi Mills, Palmyra, Pleasant Lake, Sand Creek and Pinckney State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
